channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- EAP 7.4.13
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- EAP 7.4.13

item.title: CVE-2023-4061|2024-09-16T11:44:50.460Z -- red%20hat -- eap%207.4.13
item.description: A flaw was found in wildfly-core. A management user could use the resolve-expression in the HAL Interface to read possible sensitive information from the Wildfly system. This issue could allow a malicious user to access the system and obtain possible sensitive information from the system.
